00017     :_moduleAverageTemperature(AhcTempProvider::N_MODULES, 0),
00018      _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS(AhcTempProvider::N_MODULES, 0),

00029   float AhcCern2010TempProvider::getCellTemp( int module, int chip, int chan )
00030   {
00031 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00032     cout<<"\n AhcCern2010TempProvider::getCellTemp: newCalibCol="<<newCalibCol
00033              <<" newSroModCol="<<newSroModCol
00034              <<" newSanityRange="<<newSanityRange<<endl;
00035 #endif
00036 
00037     if( AhcTempProvider::newCalibCol || AhcTempProvider::newSroModCol || AhcTempProvider::newSanityRange ) 
00038       {
00039         this->applyCorrection();
00040      }
00041  
00042     
00043     return sensorTemp.at(module-1).at(this->getSensor(chip,chan));
00044   }

00051   float AhcCern2010TempProvider::getCellTempError( int module, int chip, int chan )
00052   {

00054       {
00055         this->applyCorrection();
00056       }
00057     
00058     return sensorTempError.at(module-1).at(this->getSensor(chip,chan));
00059   }
00060 
00061  /**********************************************************************************/
00062   /*                                                                                */
00063   /* Returns the closest sensor to cell connected to chip, chan according to        */
00064   /* DESY-THESIS-2008-050                                                           */       
00065   /*                                                                                */
00066   /* For the connection between the tile, chip and temperature sensors numbers, see */
00067   /* http://www.desy.de/~richters/IJ-to-chip-channel/                               */
00068   /*                                                                                */
00069   /* In case you wonder why there is chan the argument of the function, even though */
00070   /* it is not used, it is there just for possible future usage (it would make sense*/
00071   /* to use the channel number also to find the sensor)                             */
00072   /*                                                                                */
00073   /**********************************************************************************/
00074   int AhcCern2010TempProvider::getSensor( int chip, int chan )
00075   {
00076     if( chip == 0 ) return 0;
00077     else if( (chip > 0) && (chip < 4) ) return 1;
00078     else if( (chip > 3) && (chip < 8) ) return 2;
00079     else if( (chip > 7) && (chip < 11) ) return 3;
00080     else if( chip == 11 ) return 4;
00081     
00082     throw std::out_of_range( "AhcCern2010TempProvider::getSensor(): "
00083                              "argument chip out of range (0...11)");
00084 
00085     return 0; /*should never happen */
00086   }
00087

00091   /*                                                                                */
00092   /*                                                                                */
00093   /**********************************************************************************/
00094   float AhcCern2010TempProvider::getAvgTemp()
00095   {
00096 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00097     cout<<"\n AhcCern2010TempProvider::getAvgTemp"<<endl;
00098 #endif
00099     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) 
00100       {
00101         this->applyCorrection();
00102       }
00103      
00104     return _calorimeterAverageTemperature;
00105   }

00111   /**********************************************************************************/
00112   float AhcCern2010TempProvider::getAvgModuleTemp( unsigned module )
00113   {
00114 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00115     cout<<"\n AhcCern2010TempProvider::getAvgModuleTemp"<<endl;
00116 #endif
00117     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) 
00118       {
00119         this->applyCorrection();
00120       }
00121     
00122     return _moduleAverageTemperature[module-1];   
00123   }

00127   /**********************************************************************************/
00128   /*                                                                                */
00129   /*                                                                                */
00130   /*                                                                                */
00131   /**********************************************************************************/
00132   void AhcCern2010TempProvider::applyCorrection(  )
00133   {
00134     if(!AhcTempProvider::_sroModCol) throw std::invalid_argument( "AhcCern2010TempProvider::applyCorrection(): "
00135                                                  " null pointer _sroModCol!" );
00136     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol ) 
00137       {
00138         AhcTempProvider::updateCache();
00139       }
00140 
00141 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00142    cout<<"\n AhcCern2010TempProvider::applyCorrection"<<endl;
00143 #endif
00144 
00145     for (unsigned int module = 1; module < _mapper->getMaxK(); ++module)
00146       {
00147   
00148         for(unsigned int sensor = 0; sensor < N_SENSORS; ++sensor)
00149         {
00150           this->applyCorrectionForUnreasonableSensors(module, sensor);
00151         }/*------------ end loop over sensor -----------------------------------*/
00152       }/*-------------- end loop over i ----------------------------------------*/
00153   
00154 
00155     _calorimeterAverageTemperature      = 0;
00156     _calorimeterAverageTemperatureRMS   = 0;
00157     _calorimeterAverageTemperatureCount = 0;
00158 
00159     for (unsigned int module = 1; module < _mapper->getMaxK(); ++module)
00160       {
00161         _moduleAverageTemperature[module - 1]      = 0;
00162         _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1]   = 0;
00163         _moduleAverageTemperatureCount[module - 1] = 0;
00164 
00165         for(unsigned int sensor = 0; sensor < N_SENSORS; ++sensor)
00166         {
00167           this->applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules(module, sensor);
00168 
00169           _moduleAverageTemperature[module - 1]    += sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor];
00170           _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1] += sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor] * sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor];
00171           _moduleAverageTemperatureCount[module - 1]++;
00172 
00173           _calorimeterAverageTemperature += sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor];
00174           _calorimeterAverageTemperatureRMS += sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor] * sensorTemp[module - 1][sensor];
00175           _calorimeterAverageTemperatureCount++;
00176 
00177         }/*------------ end loop over sensor -----------------------------------*/
00178 
00179         if (_moduleAverageTemperatureCount[module - 1] > 0)
00180           {
00181             _moduleAverageTemperature[module - 1]    /= _moduleAverageTemperatureCount[module - 1];
00182             _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1] /= _moduleAverageTemperatureCount[module - 1];
00183             _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1] -=  _moduleAverageTemperature[module - 1] * _moduleAverageTemperature[module - 1];
00184             _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1] = sqrt(_moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[module - 1]);
00185 
00186           }
00187       }/*-------------- end loop over i ----------------------------------------*/
00188   
00189     if (_calorimeterAverageTemperatureCount > 0)
00190       {
00191         _calorimeterAverageTemperature    /= _calorimeterAverageTemperatureCount;
00192         _calorimeterAverageTemperatureRMS /= _calorimeterAverageTemperatureCount;
00193       }
00194 
00195 
00196     newCalibCol    = false;
00197     newSroModCol   = false;
00198     newSanityRange = false;
00199 
00200     /*
00201     for (int i = 1; i <= 38; ++i)
00202       {
00203         cout<<"lntai i="<<i<<" _moduleAverageTemperature="<<_moduleAverageTemperature[i - 1]
00204             <<" _moduleAverageTemperatureRMS="<<_moduleAverageTemperatureRMS[i - 1]
00205             <<endl;
00206         cout<<"            _moduleAverageTemperatureCount: "<<_moduleAverageTemperatureCount[i - 1] <<endl;
00207         for (int j = 0; j < 5; ++j)
00208           cout<<"            sensor="<<j+1<<" temp="<<sensorTemp[i - 1][j]<<" status="<<sensorCalibStatus.at(i-1).at(j) <<endl;
00209         
00210       }
00211     */
00212 
00213   }
00214 
00215 
00216   /**********************************************************************************/
00217   /*                                                                                */
00218   /*  If the specified sensor has an unreasonable offset flag, set the temperature  */
00219   /*  the median of all sensors in that module                                      */
00220   /*                                                                                */
00221   /**********************************************************************************/
00222   void AhcCern2010TempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableSensors(int module, int sensor)
00223   {
00224     if (this->isModuleOff(module) == false)
00225       {
00226 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00227         cout<<" \n\nsize of sensorTemp["<<module<<"]="<<sensorTemp[module-1].size()<<endl;
00228 #endif
00229         
00230         std::vector<float> temperatureForMedian;
00231         temperatureForMedian.clear();
00232         
00233         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sensorTemp[module-1].size(); ++i)
00234           {
00235 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00236             cout<<"sensor: "<<i<<" module: "<<module<<" sensorStatus: "<<sensorCalibStatus.at(module-1).at(i)
00237                 <<" temperature="<<sensorTemp[module-1][i]<<endl;
00238 #endif
00239             /*calculate the median only from 'good' sensors, i.e. flag > 0*/
00240             if (sensorCalibStatus.at(module-1).at(i) > 0)
00241               {
00242                 temperatureForMedian.push_back(sensorTemp[module-1][i]);
00243               }
00244           }
00245         
00246 #ifdef AHCTEMP_DEBUG
00247         cout<<"size of temperatureForMedian: "<<temperatureForMedian.size()<<endl;
00248         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < temperatureForMedian.size(); ++j)
00249           cout<<" temperatureForMedian: "<<temperatureForMedian[j]<<endl;
00250 #endif
00251         
00252         float median = this->median(&temperatureForMedian[0], temperatureForMedian.size());
00253         /*
00254           if (median == 0) cout<<"AhcSimpleTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableTemperature: something might be wrong, "
00255           <<" median=0, all sensors for module "<<module<<" have bad status...."<<endl;
00256         */
00257         
00258         if (!sensorCalibStatus.at(module-1).at(sensor))
00259           {
00260             sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = median;
00261           }    
00262         
00263       }   
00264     
00265   }
00266   /**********************************************************************************/
00267   /*                                                                                */
00268   /*  If a module has ALL temperature sensors off, set for each sensor the          */
00269   /*  temperature to the average of neighbouring sensors (neighbouring in layers)   */
00270   /*                                                                                */
00271   /**********************************************************************************/
00272   bool AhcCern2010TempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules(int module, int sensor)
00273   {
00274     if (this->isModuleOff(module) == true)
00275       {
00276         int currentLayer = _mapper->getK(module);
00277         const int maxK = _mapper->getMaxK();
00278         
00279         /*assume we have at least 4 layers in the calorimeter*/
00280         unsigned int layerNeighbour1 = 0;
00281         unsigned int layerNeighbour2 = 0;
00282 
00283         /*---------- case 1: first layer -------------------------------------*/
00284         if (currentLayer == 1)
00285           {
00286             //cout<<" -->case1"<<endl;
00287 
00288             layerNeighbour1 = _mapper->getK(module + 1);
00289             layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module + 2);
00290             
00291             /*if first neighbour is OFF*/
00292             if (this->isModuleOff(module + 1)    == true
00293                 && this->isModuleOff(module + 2) == false)
00294               {
00295                 if (this->isModuleOff(module + 3) == false)
00296                   {
00297                     layerNeighbour1 = layerNeighbour2;
00298                     layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module + 3);
00299                   }
00300                 else
00301                   {
00302                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00303                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00304 
00305                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00306                     return false;
00307                     
00308                   }
00309               }
00310             /*if last neighbour is OFF*/
00311             if (this->isModuleOff(module + 1)    == false
00312                 && this->isModuleOff(module + 2) == true)
00313               {
00314                 if (this->isModuleOff(module + 3) == false)
00315                   {
00316                     layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module + 3);
00317                   }
00318                 else
00319                   {
00320                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00321                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00322 
00323                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00324                     return false;
00325                     
00326                   }
00327               }
00328 
00329             /*if both neighbours are OFF*/
00330             if (this->isModuleOff(module + 1)    == true
00331                 && this->isModuleOff(module + 2) == true)
00332               {
00333                 cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00334                     <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00335 
00336                 sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00337                 return false;
00338               }
00339           }/*end if (current == 1)*/
00340 
00341         /*------------ case 2: last layer ---------------------------------*/
00342         else if (currentLayer == maxK - 1)
00343           {
00344             //cout<<" -->case2"<<endl;
00345 
00346             layerNeighbour1 = _mapper->getK(module - 1);
00347             layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module - 2);
00348             
00349             /*if first neighbour is OFF*/
00350             if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == true
00351                 && this->isModuleOff(module - 2) == false)
00352               {
00353                 if (this->isModuleOff(module - 3) == false)
00354                   {
00355                     layerNeighbour1 = layerNeighbour2;
00356                     layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module - 3);
00357                   }
00358                 else
00359                   {
00360                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00361                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00362                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00363                     return false;
00364                     
00365                   }
00366               }
00367             /*if last neighbour is OFF*/
00368             if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == false
00369                 && this->isModuleOff(module - 2) == true)
00370               {
00371                 if (this->isModuleOff(module - 3) == false)
00372                   {
00373                     layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module - 3);
00374                   }
00375                 else
00376                   {
00377                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00378                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00379                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00380                     return false;
00381                     
00382                   }
00383               }
00384 
00385             /*if both neighbours are OFF*/
00386             if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == true
00387                 && this->isModuleOff(module - 2) == true)
00388               {
00389                 cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00390                     <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00391                 sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00392                 return false;
00393               }
00394           }
00395             
00396         /*------- last case: the other layers -------------------------------*/
00397         else 
00398           {
00399             //cout<<" -->case other"<<endl;
00400 
00401             
00402             layerNeighbour1 = _mapper->getK(module - 1);
00403             layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module + 1);
00404             
00405             /*if the lower neighbour is OFF*/
00406             if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == true
00407                 && this->isModuleOff(module + 1) == false)
00408               {
00409                 if ((module - 2) < maxK  && this->isModuleOff(module - 2) == false)
00410                   layerNeighbour1 = _mapper->getK(module - 2);
00411                 else
00412                   {
00413                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00414                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00415                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00416                     return false;
00417                     
00418                   }
00419               }
00420             
00421             /*if the upper neighbour is OFF*/
00422             else if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == false
00423                      && this->isModuleOff(module + 1) == true)
00424               {
00425                 if ((module + 2) < maxK  && this->isModuleOff(module + 2) == false)
00426                   layerNeighbour2 = _mapper->getK(module + 2);
00427                 else
00428                   {
00429                     cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00430                         <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00431                     sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00432                     return false;
00433                     
00434                   }
00435               }
00436             /*if both neighbours are OFF*/
00437             else if (this->isModuleOff(module - 1)    == true
00438                      && this->isModuleOff(module + 1) == true)
00439               {
00440                 cout<<"\n===============> AhcTempProvider::applyCorrectionForUnreasonableModules: "
00441                     <<" more than 2 consecutive AHCAL modules are OFF in temperatures, don't know how to correct this"<<endl;
00442                 sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = 0;
00443                 return false;
00444               }
00445             
00446           }/*end of last case*/
00447 
00448         float tempNeighbour1 = sensorTemp[_mapper->getModule(layerNeighbour1) - 1][sensor];
00449         float tempNeighbour2 = sensorTemp[_mapper->getModule(layerNeighbour2) - 1][sensor];
00450 
00451         float extrapolatedTemperature = 0;
00452 
00453         if (currentLayer == 1 || currentLayer == maxK - 1)
00454             extrapolatedTemperature = tempNeighbour1 - (tempNeighbour2 - tempNeighbour1);
00455         else
00456           extrapolatedTemperature = (tempNeighbour1 + tempNeighbour2)/2.;
00457         
00458         if (extrapolatedTemperature > 0) 
00459           sensorTemp[module-1][sensor] = extrapolatedTemperature;
00460 
00461       }/*end if isModuleOff*/
00462 
00463     return true;
00464   }
00465 
00466   /**********************************************************************************/
00467   /*                                                                                */
00468   /*                                                                                */
00469   /*                                                                                */
00470   /**********************************************************************************/
00471   bool AhcCern2010TempProvider::isModuleOff( int module )
00472   {
00473     unsigned int countOffSensorsPerModule = 0;
00474     for(unsigned iSensor = 0; iSensor < N_SENSORS; ++iSensor)
00475       {
00476         if ( sensorCalibStatus.at(module-1).at(iSensor) ==0 )
00477           countOffSensorsPerModule++;
00478       }
00479     
00480     if (countOffSensorsPerModule == N_SENSORS) return true;
00481     else return false;
00482   }
00483 
00484 
00485   /**********************************************************************************/
00486   /*                                                                                */
00487   /*                                                                                */
00488   /*                                                                                */
00489   /**********************************************************************************/
00490   float AhcCern2010TempProvider::getSensorTemp( int module, int sensor )
00491   {
00492     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) 
00493       {
00494         this->applyCorrection();
00495       }
00496 
00497     if (sensor > 4) throw std::invalid_argument( "AhcSimpleTempProvider::"
00498                                                  "AhcSimpleTempProvider::getSensorTemp: "
00499                                                  " sensor out of range ( > 4)" );
00500       return sensorTemp.at(module-1).at(sensor);
00501   }
00502 
00503   
00504   /**********************************************************************************/
00505   /*                                                                                */
00506   /*                                                                                */
00507   /*                                                                                */
00508   /**********************************************************************************/
00509   double AhcCern2010TempProvider::median(float a[], int n)
00510   {  
00511     float temp;
00512     
00513     for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00514       {
00515         for( int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j)
00516           {
00517             if(a[i] > a[j])
00518               {     
00519                 temp = a[j];
00520                 a[j] = a[i];
00521                 a[i] = temp;        
00522               } 
00523           }/*end loop over j*/
00524       }/*end loop over i*/
00525     
00526     if(n % 2 == 0)
00527       {
00528         return (a[n/2]+a[n/2-1])/2;
00529       }
00530     else
00531       {
00532         return a[n/2];
00533       }
00534   }
00535
